p: ZRR has been widely used for nausea and vomiting since ancient times, and modern research has also confirmed the antiemetic effect of ZRR during pregnancy, chemotherapy, and surgery. For pregnant women with mild to moderate nausea and vomiting in the early stage of pregnancy, ZRR (500 mg) and vitamin B6 (40 mg) were administered twice a day, and the effect is equivalent. However, ZRR is more effective for severity of nausea and amount of vomiting [ 55].
